TopicTitle: What you will do first in 0.12?

Articles.Content: Don\'t read post, vote.
DESTROY THE MUN.
'Better check singularity'?
Well first, I\'ll stick some gimballing engines into the shuttle for max awesome, then use them as verniers, then use my vernier rocket to reach the moon and finally BLOW UP.

'Better check singularity'????

'a point in spacetime in which gravitational forces cause matter to have an infinite density and zero volume'

AKA Blackholes.

He means to check your blackhole.

'a point in spacetime in which gravitational forces cause matter to have an infinite density and zero volume'

AKA Blackholes.

He means to check your blackhole.

I know what it is, I just don\'t see why it\'s in the poll.

I know what it is, I just don\'t see why it\'s in the poll.

There are going to be black holes on the Mun obviously.
It\'s in there because the sun will have mass and gravity, but no surface-vaguely similar to a singularity.

It\'s in there because the sun will have mass and gravity, but no surface-vaguely similar to a singularity.

Yes, i mean this.

I do not mean this.

But my search for Munblackholecreaturesfromtheabyssofdoom will go on.
Same as with any other version. Build a rocket, launch a rocket, laugh maniacally as the rocket explodes in a big ball of fiery death.

Same as with any other version. Build a rocket, launch a rocket, laugh maniacally as the rocket explodes in a big ball of fiery death.

Pony hiccup maniacally? Or the 'I just put the world at risk for amusement' one?

Pony hiccup maniacally? Or the 'I just put the world at risk for amusement' one?

Thusly:

Thusly:

There was no laughter.

Just pain, very very heavily burn into my memory pain.
Download it approximately 3 times until something appears in the folder and it stops giving me errors.

Uh, Mun? \'Nuff said.

Seriously, I have nothing more to say in this post.

Well, except for that.

And that.

And that.

Now I have nothing more to say.

Except for my signature.

Curse you, endless paradox.
mmm i will probably play with my spaceplanes for a bit. then i might decide to launch into orbit. maybe to a hoffman\'s transfer to the moon. but this is all maybe. im not sure yet

First, probably BOOM...

Then MÃ¼n!
Have a load of trouble getting it to work.
Start it up and when I get to the VAB, wind up completely forgetting what the new features were and immediately begin testing random garbage.
Stare at the mun for half an hour before I remember that I can go there.
MUNSHOT!!!

'Booster?' '*maniacal cackle* GO!'

'FIDO?' 'GO!'

'Retro?' 'He\'s at home, we don\'t need him on this one, sir.'

'Oh, right. EECOM?' 'Same.'

'Gah. TELMU?' 'GO!'

'G-and-N?' 'GO!'

'RSO?' '...sorry, did you need me? I was in the can.'

'Close enough. Science?' 'Er... well... I think the camera\'s working... which way was \'up\' on this TV doohickey again?'

'*sigh* Surgeon? GO!'

'CDR?' 'GOOOOOOOOO! GOGOGOGOGOGOGOGOGOGOGOGOGOGOGO *continues unabated until CAPCOM cuts his microphone*'

'...thanks, CAPCOM. Spacecraft pilot?' 'Ugh... my head... what hit me?'

'Science pilot?' 'OH GOD LET ME OUT OF THIS THING!'

'Right. CAPCOM, Kranger I is GO for launch! Booster, get out your Zippo and light the fuse.' 'Roger, Flight!'

Final testing of my Munar Lander, and couple of manned dry runs.

Then the will-be fully documented Grand Moonshot. 8)

Landers, galore!

Same as I do with every new version; build a simple rocket, get it in to oibit. Play with new features i.e. gimballing engines.

Then reinstall the mods, load up the Mun lander and go to the Mun! Without testing it first of course : ;D
